title: Plenmo Session Fixes - January 15, 2026
description: Fix remaining issues from deployment review session

issues.title: Add PostHog environment variable to Vercel
issues.description: PostHog analytics is initialized in the app but NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_KEY is not set in Vercel production environment. This means no analytics data is being collected.
acceptance_criteria: Document that NEXT_PUBLIC_POSTHOG_KEY needs to be set in Vercel
Verify PostHog initialization handles missing key gracefully

issues.title: Verify and fix Plenny chat input text visibility
issues.description: The summary mentioned that the Plenny AI assistant chat input has white text on a light background, making it invisible. Need to verify this is still an issue and fix if so.
acceptance_criteria: Ensure input text is visible (white/light text on dark background)
Test in both light and dark contexts
Input should have: text-white, bg-black/30 or similar dark bg

issues.title: Add user-friendly error handling to SendMoneyForm
issues.description: The payment page now has user-friendly errors, but SendMoneyForm may still show technical errors. Apply the same parseUserFriendlyError pattern.
acceptance_criteria: Parse technical contract errors into plain English
Show helpful hints for common errors (insufficient balance, network issues)
Use amber warning style instead of harsh red for recoverable errors
Include actionable next steps in error messages

issues.title: Add .env.example with all required variables
issues.description: Document all environment variables needed for deployment so future developers don't miss anything.
acceptance_criteria: Create or update .env.example with all NEXT_PUBLIC_* variables
List which are required vs optional
Include PostHog, Privy, Gemini, RPC, and Chain ID vars

issues.title: Remove unused email dependencies
issues.description: Since we switched to link sharing, the Resend and SendGrid code is mostly unused. Clean up unused imports and simplify the notify API.
acceptance_criteria: Keep email infrastructure for future use but simplify
Remove @sendgrid/mail from package.json if not needed
Update notify API to clearly indicate email is optional/coming soon
Ensure build passes without email provider configured
